https://tmrev.io/movie/412554-Bridge to Babylon - Rome, Ecumenism & The Bible 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/y0nglCFB5JD3edSWPVu8nbYTuqr.jpg Follow the story of the Bible's controversial history into the twentieth century, as the work of Westcott and Hort would transform biblical scholarship, inspire the work of various Bible Societies, and pave the way for the cause of ecumenical unity between Evangelical Protestants and Rome. Bridge to Babylon - Rome, Ecumenism & The Bible
